website_summaries.verdict: Designed to keep wearers warm through snowy, windy winters with plunging temperatures. Seamless design is classy and versatile.
pros: Shell is made of GORE-TEX, a breathable, waterproof covering
Available in seven colors, including jewel tones and neutrals
Bulk-free sleeve and arm panel allow for layering
Hood has adjustable bungee cords, laminated brim, and full lining
cons: Expensive, and some wearers cite that smaller sizes are more on par with petite sizing

customer_reviews.title: It's gorgeous and noisy
customer_reviews.text: Arc'teryx makes incredible gear and this coat was really well engineered with thoughtful touches (like the zipper garage around the neck so you don't get scratched by the zipper teeth). But the large is made for women who have HUGE chests (who are they measuring?) - this is true in general now with outdoor gear companies. Size large is assumed to also be Size BIG, which I am not. At 5' 10" 135 pounds I'm not wide, but I am tall. So for my body, this was a no go. The fabric is also really stiff and very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: bungeedog

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Big. Noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Another Patera in my coat search it was like the others, the wrong cut for my body (made for Kate Upton types) and the fabric is stiff and noisy when you walk. It's beautifully made and if it fit you, it's a coat you'd have forever. But not my shape.
customer_reviews.author: bungeedog

customer_reviews.title: Super fitted
customer_reviews.text: What others have said about it being very fitted is true. I ordered the extra small and returned it because I didn't think a blazer or sweater would fit under it. I probably should have looked up what a morganite stone looks like - but it doesn't look like the photo. It was a pink hue but looked more like an opal. Definitely not the neutral in the photo. I'm returning for a small and different color. It did seem really warm and I didn't have any issues with the zipper. It's perfect for the city. I bought it to zip myself into something to keep warm when I am walking the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Not that warm for below freezing temps.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9” 127 lbs and bought a medium. Fits nicely on body but sleeves could be more generous in length. Zipper is a little quirky as other reviews have pointed out. Not as warm as I would have expected. It’s warm with an additional down layer under it. I was hoping it was warm on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arc'teryx patera looks class and really keep me warm in Iceland snow storm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as warm as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It is not warm as I would expect for the brand/cost. It is also not as long so the cold comes from your legs and moves up. Just not enough to keep you warm. I was pretty upset as I read it would be enough for winter.
customer_reviews.author: qnm23456

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and warm
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and warm. I am typically a size medium but ordered a large so the arms would be long enough for me (6'1" tall). Love it for our Michigan winters.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coat. Tends to show dirt easily. Color could be darker black.
customer_reviews.author: William J. DePaso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cold wet snow, sleet etc. hood has complete coverage and like the zip up pockets
customer_reviews.author: crayons

customer_reviews.title: Good for Wisconsin winter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for everyday wear. I walk a block or two into work daily in negative Wisconsin winters and need to stay warm. I am 5’11’’ 160pounds and the medium fit nicely. I wish the arms were just a bit longer and that the jacket was a bit longer. Jacket is sleek and lightweight and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Molly W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very warm winter jacket, doesn’t require multiple layers underneath even on single digit days. I had to return the large for a medium, but had no issues, the medium fits perfectly. Nice athletic fit.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Things you should know
customer_reviews.text: Great coat. I am a small but upsized to medium. It was still too big. The zipper on this item is bloody awful and I anticipate it will break within the first 12 months of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Merton

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Great coat. Stylish and form-fitting while very functional for withstanding cold, rain, snow. Really soft interior too.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coat. All the warmth of a puffer but way more sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Weaver

customer_reviews.title: The perfect winter jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9" and this coat is the perfect length, including the sleeves. Super soft and cozy. My only complaint is that the exterior pockets could be bigger!
customer_reviews.author: KChid

customer_reviews.title: Great for chilly and rainy cold winter days
customer_reviews.text: Great for chilly and rainy cold winter days. Insulation keeps me warm. Fit was as expected. Only disapointment was color - not true black, more like a gray.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Horrible zipper, but great quality on the jacket, amazing jacket.
customer_reviews.text: SO warm! the quality of the down and the exterior is great, my only bugger is the zipper, that zipper has some major issues, I always have a hard time zipping it up, I was not able to return it as I need it this jacket immediately but I wish I had because this zipper is horrible. :(
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoAnn

customer_reviews.title: XS size has "petite" length and proportions
customer_reviews.text: The width is perfect, including width in shoulders and chest. But sleeves are a tad short, and the waistline is about 10cm too high, at my ribcage. Not a good fit, unfortunately. Returning. I'm 5'8", 112 lbs. Usually wear size XS. Usually wear Marmot Chelsea in XS, it fits nicely Wanted to switch to Arcteryx Patera, but not happy with the fit. Will have to stick to Marmot for now.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna
